entry.title: WIND WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:03 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 01:00 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023
Temperature: 2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 2.7°C
Wind: NW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending before morning then partly cloudy. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind light except north 60 km/h gusting to 80 over southern sections overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 9:15 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind light except north 70 km/h gusting to 90 over southern sections in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 9:15 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 9:15 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023
